names.pinyin: ju pi zhi shi sheng jiang tang
names.english: tangerine peel, unripe bitter orange and fresh ginger decoction
names.commonEnglish: Tangerine Peel, Unripe Bitter Orange, and Fresh Ginger Decoction

actions: Moves Qi, disperses knots, and stops pain.
With Sheng Jiang, for vomiting and hiccups due to Disharmony of the Stomach Qi.
Breaks up Stagnant Qi, reduces accumulation, descends Qi, unblocks the bowels, removes Stagnant Food, transforms Phlegm, reduces distention and resolves hardenings.
Releases the Exterior, induces perspiration, disperses Cold, warms the Middle, stops vomiting and adjusts the Ying and Wei.

symptoms: Glomus and congestion in the chest
